title: Large-Scale Task-Centered Instructional Design for Formal Application Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and equation-solving skills
context.additional_context: An educational environment emphasizing improvement of practical problem-solving skills for learners primarily preparing for employment. Utilizes digital resource supplements via personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can identify and apply appropriate mathematical formulas with 90% accuracy to solve real-life problems
Learners can create process maps with three or more logical stages explaining formula application
Learners can diagnose and correct over 80% of errors in formula application through peer/self-assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
